title: Verizon Wireless 5G Home Internet Review - Is it a good alternative to cable or fiber?
description:
See more ISP reviews: https://lon.tv/broadband - A friend of mine recently switched his home Internet to Verizon Wireless Home Internet service. So far he's pleased with the service quality and I found it to be great for casual users but not so great for gamers and power users. Subscribe for more ! http://lon.tv/s

VIDEO INDEX:
00:00 - Intro
00:30 - Pricing
01:13 - Gateway / Router
02:34 - Smartphone Network Test
03:12 - Gateway Speed Test
04:04 - Netflix Test
04:48 - Hulu Live Problem
05:28 - Gaming
06:03 - Ping Test
07:04 - No Data Cap
07:27 - Router Features
08:11 - Tech Details
08:57 - Service From My House
09:39 - Conclusion
